title: Yolo v8n Pose
description: Lightweight model for multi pose estimation
long_description: Yolov8n_pose is a lightweight and efficient model designed for multi pose estimation tasks. It is part of the YOLO (You Only Look Once) family of models, known for their real-time object detection capabilities. The "n" in Yolov8n_pose indicates that it is a nano version, optimized for speed and resource efficiency, making it suitable for deployment on devices with limited computational power, such as mobile devices and embedded systems.

links.label: GitHub
links.heading: Try Today
links.sub-heading: Deploy the pre-trained model to your PSOC™ Edge Eval Kit
